trans-unit.target:
Hi %firstname%,

Thank you for creating your Matchico employer account and for taking the first step towards improving your hiring process! One of our team members will reach out to you in the next days to help you get started.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about completing your profile or about any of our services, just reply to this email and we will get back to you right away.

Michel Rothgaenger
Managing Director
Matchico
